title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the operation does not have any effect.
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view to add Javadoc, no changes are observed.
EB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempting to add Javadoc, the expected behavior is that the Javadoc is successfully added to the selected field.
SR: 1. Open Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field. 3. Attempt to add Javadoc to the selected field. Ensure that the Javadoc is successfully added.
